alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 11:53AM MST until February 16 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma County. In Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock and Red Willow Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Wednesday to 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
